oracle.spatial.rdf.client.jena

Class OracleQueryMgtServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • oracle.spatial.rdf.client.jena.OracleQueryMgtServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class OracleQueryMgtServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Servlet Entry point to Oracle SPARQL Query Management. To ensure that this servlet is working properly, a data source has to be created. The lookup name of the data source is "OracleSemDS" and it is defined in the Oracle class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
